page.title: 12Denbigh's 43rd Flower Show
page.content: The sun shone on this popular event, held on{24th August}on{Lon Felin {Field, Ystrad Rd.,}which proved to be a record breaker with more entries and prizes than ever before. The{Mayor also set a record by celebrating{25 {years}as its{secretary.}Among the many events staged were{Horse-jumping}and {Morris Dancing}competitions; displays of{veteran cars, gymnastics}and {dancing;Punch and Judy,}a{Dog show}and a parade by{Flint}and{Denbigh Hounds. The main tent housing{over 300}classes including{floral, vegetable, cookery, {painting, handicraft,}etc. was a focal point displaying a high standard of achievement by local people. Some eye catching displays on a theme of{"I {Remember, I Remember"}were a central feature.A theme echoed many times in conversations held by old friends and exiles at this{annual meeting place.
